pageProduct.name: Ocean Healthcare Adult Wipes 50 Pack
pageProduct.description:
Information

Ocean Healthcare Hygienic Body Wipes are a simple solution to washing that requires no use of water, no additional products or towels. Paraben and alcohol free formulation. Gentle on fragile skin. Quick and easy hygienic cleaning.

Quick and easy solution for incontinence, emesis and food residue

  • Alcohol free
  • Contains Aloe Vera
  • Adult sized wipes
  • pH balanced
  • Handy snap closed lid
  • No water needed

    • Ocean Healthcare wipes contain Aloe Vera to help soothe the skin

    Ocean Healthcare wipes are pH Balanced to prevent irritating the skin

    Ocean Healthcare wipes are free from Paraben & Alcohol

    Ocean Healthcare wipes are large & Soft for use all over the body

    General Information

    Ocean Healthcare Hygienic Body Wipes with aloe vera is pH balanced, alcohol and paraben free. A high quality spunlace wipes that no water required.

    Quick and easy clean up solution for food residue, incontinence and emesis. 
    A simple solution to washing that requires no use of water, no additional products or towels.
    Paraben and alcohol free formulation.

    Suitable For: Suitable for daily use.

    Product Claims: pH balanced, alcohol and paraben free. Not tested on animals.

    Boxed Contents: 50 large & soft wipes

    Size: 50 Pack

    Warnings

    Please dispose of used wipes in a waste receptacle. Store at room temperature. DO NOT FLUSH. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse well with warm water.

    Ingredients

    Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Coco-Glucoside, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, 2-Bromo-2-Nitropropane-1, 3-Diol, Parfum

    Directions

    Open lid and remove seal. Use wipes to cleanse body as desired. Gentle enough to use all over body. Suitable for daily use. Close lid after use to prevent wipes drying out.

    Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

    Recycling Code: 7 O(ther)
